languages.text: "И ради чего же?!" {n}Ирлиэт вскидывает голову, в ее глазах пылает гнев.{/n} "Мои собратья, те, ради кого я отправилась с тобой, так и не были найдены! Почему ты не устремил{mf||а} все свои силы на то, чтобы отыскать их? Чтобы не дать им сгореть в жаре ненависти, что пылает между нашими видами? Элантах, я надеялась на тебя!"

"And for what?" {n}Yrliet jerks her head, rage burning in her eyes.{/n} "My kin, the reason why I agreed to travel with you, have not been found! Why have you not focused all your efforts on searching for them? To save them from burning in the fires of hatred between our species? I put my faith in you, elantach!"
languages.original_text: "И ради чего же?!" {n}Ирлиэт вскидывает голову, в ее глазах пылает гнев.{/n} "Мои собратья, те, ради кого я отправилась с тобой, так и не были найдены! Почему ты не устремил{mf||а} все свои силы на то, чтобы отыскать их? Чтобы не дать им сгореть в жаре ненависти, что пылает между нашими видами? Элантах, я надеялась на тебя!"

traits.locale_text: "And for what?!" {n}Yrliet jerks her head, rage burning in her eyes.{/n} My kinsmen, the ones I've been travelling with you for, have never been found! Why didn;t you focus all your efforts to find them? To not let them burn in the fires of hatred that is blazing between our species? I counted on you, elantach!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And for what?!" {n}Yrliet jerks her head, rage burning in her eyes.{/n} My kinsmen, the ones I've been travelling with you for, have never been found! Why didn;t you focus all your efforts to find them? To not let them burn in the fires of hatred that is blazing between our species? I counted on you, elantach!"

traits.locale_text: "And for what?" {n}Yrliet jerks her head, rage burning in her eyes.{/n} "My kin, the reason why I agreed to travel with you, have not been found! Why have you not focused all your efforts on searching for them? To save them from burning in the fires of hatred between our species? I put my faith in you, elantach!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

Why have you not focused all your efforts on searching for them? To save them from burning in the fires of hatred between our species? I put my faith in you, elantach!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And for what?" {n}Yrliet jerks her head, rage burning in her eyes.{/n} "My kin, the reason why I agreed to travel with you, have not been found! Why have you not focused all your efforts on searching for them? To save them from burning in the fires of hatred between our species? I put my faith in you, elantach!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “可这一切都是为了什么？”{n}伊莉耶特恼火地甩了甩头，对你怒目而视。{/n}“我这么做事为了我的族人。我就是为了找到他们，才答应与你结伴而行！可你为什么不集中全力寻找他们？你为什么不愿意拯救他们免受种族仇恨之火的折磨？我曾那么相信你，外界人！”
languages.original_text: "And for what?" {n}Yrliet jerks her head, rage burning in her eyes.{/n} "My kin, the reason why I agreed to travel with you, have not been found! Why have you not focused all your efforts on searching for them? To save them from burning in the fires of hatred between our species? I put my faith in you, elantach!"

traits.locale_text: “可这一切都是为了什么？”{n}伊莉耶特恼火地甩了甩头，对你怒目而视。{/n}“我这么做事为了我的族人。我就是为了找到他们，才答应与你结伴而行！可你为什么不集中全力寻找他们？你为什么不愿意拯救他们免受种族仇恨之火的折磨？我曾那么相信你，外界人！”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Y para qué?». {n}Yrliet yergue la cabeza bruscamente; sus ojos echan chispas.{/n} «¡Mi pueblo, el motivo por el que accedí a viajar contigo, sigue sin aparecer! ¿Por qué no has dedicado todos tus esfuerzos a buscarlos? ¿A salvarlos de morir abrasados por el fuego del odio que enfrenta a nuestras especies? ¡Deposité mi confianza en ti, elantach!».
languages.original_text: "And for what?" {n}Yrliet jerks her head, rage burning in her eyes.{/n} "My kin, the reason why I agreed to travel with you, have not been found! Why have you not focused all your efforts on searching for them? To save them from burning in the fires of hatred between our species? I put my faith in you, elantach!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y para qué?». {n}Yrliet yergue la cabeza bruscamente; sus ojos echan chispas.{/n} «¡Mi pueblo, el motivo por el que accedí a viajar contigo, sigue sin aparecer! ¿Por qué no has dedicado todos tus esfuerzos a buscarlos? ¿A salvarlos de morir abrasados por el fuego del odio que enfrenta a nuestras especies? ¡Deposité mi confianza en ti, elantach!».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Et tout cela pour quoi ? » {n}Yrliet relève brusquement la tête, les yeux flamboyants de colère.{/n} « Nous n'avons toujours pas retrouvé mes semblables, alors que c'est la seule et unique raison pour laquelle j'ai accepté de vous suivre ! Pourquoi n'avez-vous pas consacré tout votre temps à leur recherche ? Pourquoi ne pas avoir essayé de les sauver des flammes de la haine qui consument nos espèces ? Je vous faisais confiance, elantach ! »
languages.original_text: "And for what?" {n}Yrliet jerks her head, rage burning in her eyes.{/n} "My kin, the reason why I agreed to travel with you, have not been found! Why have you not focused all your efforts on searching for them? To save them from burning in the fires of hatred between our species? I put my faith in you, elantach!"

traits.locale_text: « Et tout cela pour quoi ? » {n}Yrliet relève brusquement la tête, les yeux flamboyants de colère.{/n} « Nous n'avons toujours pas retrouvé mes semblables, alors que c'est la seule et unique raison pour laquelle j'ai accepté de vous suivre ! Pourquoi n'avez-vous pas consacré tout votre temps à leur recherche ? Pourquoi ne pas avoir essayé de les sauver des flammes de la haine qui consument nos espèces ? Je vous faisais confiance, elantach ! »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Und wofür?" {n}Yrliet schüttelt den Kopf, in ihren Augen brennt Wut.{/n} "Meine Leute, der Grund, warum ich zugestimmt habe, mit Euch zu reisen, wurden nicht gefunden! Warum habt Ihr nicht all Eure Bemühungen darauf konzentriert, nach ihnen zu suchen? Sie davon zu befreien, im Feuer des Hasses zwischen unseren Spezies zu verbrennen? Ich habe mein Vertrauen in Euch gelegt, Elantach!"
languages.original_text: "And for what?" {n}Yrliet jerks her head, rage burning in her eyes.{/n} "My kin, the reason why I agreed to travel with you, have not been found! Why have you not focused all your efforts on searching for them? To save them from burning in the fires of hatred between our species? I put my faith in you, elantach!"

traits.locale_text: "Und wofür?" {n}Yrliet schüttelt den Kopf, in ihren Augen brennt Wut.{/n} "Meine Leute, der Grund, warum ich zugestimmt habe, mit Euch zu reisen, wurden nicht gefunden! Warum habt Ihr nicht all Eure Bemühungen darauf konzentriert, nach ihnen zu suchen? Sie davon zu befreien, im Feuer des Hasses zwischen unseren Spezies zu verbrennen? Ich habe mein Vertrauen in Euch gelegt, Elantach!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「何のために？」{n}ユリエットは首をかしげ、目に怒りを燃やす。{/n}「我が同族は、お前との旅に同意した理由は、見つかっていないのに！なぜお前は彼らを探すためにあらゆる努力を成さなかった？種族間の憎しみの炎から彼らを救うためだというのに？我はお前に信頼をおいたのだ、エランタ！」
languages.original_text: "And for what?" {n}Yrliet jerks her head, rage burning in her eyes.{/n} "My kin, the reason why I agreed to travel with you, have not been found! Why have you not focused all your efforts on searching for them? To save them from burning in the fires of hatred between our species? I put my faith in you, elantach!"

traits.locale_text: 「何のために？」{n}ユリエットは首をかしげ、目に怒りを燃やす。{/n}「我が同族は、お前との旅に同意した理由は、見つかっていないのに！なぜお前は彼らを探すためにあらゆる努力を成さなかった？種族間の憎しみの炎から彼らを救うためだというのに？我はお前に信頼をおいたのだ、エランタ！」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ne için?" {n}Başını kaldıran Yrliet'in gözlerinden öfke fışkırıyor.{/n} "Soyumu, yani seninle yolculuk etmeyi kabul etmemin sebebimi bulamadık! Neden onları bulmak için elinden geleni yapmadın? Neden onları türlerimiz arasındaki nefret ateşinde yanmaktan kurtarmadın? Sana güvenmiştim elantach!"
languages.original_text: "And for what?" {n}Yrliet jerks her head, rage burning in her eyes.{/n} "My kin, the reason why I agreed to travel with you, have not been found! Why have you not focused all your efforts on searching for them? To save them from burning in the fires of hatred between our species? I put my faith in you, elantach!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne için?" {n}Yrliet başını kaldırıyor, gözlerinden öfke fışkırıyor.{/n} "Benim soyum, seninle yolculuk etmeyi kabul etmemin sebebi bulunamadı! Neden onları bulmak için elinden geleni yapmadın? Onları türlerimiz arasındaki nefret ateşinde yanmaktan neden kurtarmadın? Sana güvenmiştim elantach!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
